title: Daily Review with Clay and Buck - Nov 10 2021
itunes:title: Daily Review with Clay and Buck - Nov 10 2021
description:
The Kyle Rittenhouse trial and how the dishonest media narrative is a large part of the story.. Dr. Marty Makary answers questions on vaccines and kids – safe or excessive? – and how natural immunity plays into the equation. Flashback to Fauci in '83 talking about "the science" of contracting HIV through casual contact. Clay puts on his lawyer hat and explains the meaning of a mistrial with prejudice and what this means for the Rittenhouse trial.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

Follow Clay & Buck on YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/c/clayandbuck

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
